RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Results from query to NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database (NED), which is operated by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of Technology, under contract with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. This work was (partially) supported by the US National Virtual Observatory development project, which is funded by the National Science Foundation under cooperative agreement AST0122449 with The Johns Hopkins University.

FIELD.name: No.
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A sequential data-point number applicable to this list only.

FIELD.name: RA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The RA position as published, converted to the Equatorial J2000.0 system, longitude.

FIELD.name: DEC
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The DEC position as published, converted to the Equatorial J2000.0 system, latitude.

FIELD.name: Frequency
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength at which the data apply (in common astronomical jargon, e.g. "V" for the Johnson Vband, "IRAS 12 microns" for the IRAS 12 micron band, etc.)

FIELD.name: Uncertainty Ellipse Semi-Major Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The 95 percent uncertainty ellipse (semi-major axis)

FIELD.name: Uncertainty Ellipse Semi-Minor Axis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The 95 percent uncertainty ellipse (semi-minor axis)

FIELD.name: Uncertainty Ellipse PA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The 95 percent uncertainty ellipse (position angle)

FIELD.name: Refcode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The NED 19-digit Bibliographic Reference code.

FIELD.name: Published Name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Published_name, in NED's standard format, of the object to which the data apply.

FIELD.name: Published RA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The coordinate RA in HHMMSS.S format as published.

FIELD.name: Published Dec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The coordinate DEC in DDMMSS format, as published.

FIELD.name: Published RA Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: uncertainty ellipse, as published, usually standard deviations in RA

FIELD.name: Published Dec Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Uncertainty ellipse, as published, usually standard deviations in DEC

FIELD.name: Published PA Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Uncertainty position angle, as published, usually standard deviations in position angle

FIELD.name: Uncertainty Significance
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of uncertainty reported in the original publication.

FIELD.name: Published Equinox
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The equinox to which the coordinates are referred (usually B1950.0 or J2000.0).

FIELD.name: Published Epoch
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date of the observation (if given in the original publication).

FIELD.name: NED Frequency
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frame in which the frequency or wavelength is defined (OBS for observatory reference frame, and REST for object or source rest frame); and the frequency in Hz, as translated by NED.

FIELD.name: Published System Coordinate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Coordinate System: Equatorial, Galactic, supergalactic, etc.

FIELD.name: Published Unit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Coordinate Units: Sexagesimal, Decimal Degrees, etc.

FIELD.name: Published Frame
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Fundamental Reference Frame: FK3, FK4, FK5, ICR[F], etc.

FIELD.name: Published Frequence Mode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Frequency Mode: The method(s) by which the data were collected, reduced, or derived, in relation to the frequency or wavelength.

FIELD.name: Qualifiers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Qualifiers: Self-explanatory notes about the data.

TR.TD: Uncertainty in time seconds and arcseconds; 90% confidence level
Uncertainty in time minutes and arcminutes; uncertainty
